name: Paleo Ocean Rogue-like (need name ideas)
description:
WASD or arrows to move, Q to rest.

Trilobites will attack you, and you can attack them by moving in their direction. (will add health bars soon)

Anything else, feel free to dm or ping me on discord; Rhaskia#3711

` (Backtick, should be top left on a keyboard) to leave the game. (Everything saves!)
